item.title: MySQL Communication link failure
item.dc:creator: @BitchPk BitchPk
item.description:
@BitchPk wrote:

hey guys, what seems to be the problem? it says cant connect but the URL is right.

[code]public class HiscoresHandler {
private static boolean HiScores = true;

private static final String DB = "a3232235_High";
private static final String URL = "mysql1.000webhost.com";
private static final String USER = "a3232235_scores";
private static final String PASS = "*****";
private static final Properties prop;
static {
	prop = new Properties();
	prop.put("user", USER);
	prop.put("password", PASS);
	//prop.put("autoReconnect", "true");
	//prop.put("maxReconnects", "4");
}

public static Connection conn = null;

/**
 * Connects to the database
 */
public static synchronized void connect() {
	try {
		Class.forName("com.mysql.jdbc.Driver");
		conn = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://" + URL + "/" + DB, prop);
		System.out.println("Hiscores Handler: Success");
	} catch (Exception e) {
		System.out.println("Hiscores Handler Error: "+ e);
		System.out.println("Setting hiscores to false to help not cause anymore errors.");
		HiScores = false;
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic
